thread.title: Angry elephant throws branch at terrified tourists during safari adventure - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Angry elephant throws branch at terrified tourists during safari adventure - Yahoo7

author: News On February
title: Angry elephant throws branch at terrified tourists during safari adventure - Yahoo7
text:
Share Angry elephant throws branch at terrified tourists during safari adventure - Yahoo7 An agitated elephant has taken to throwing tree branches at a car of terrified tourists seemingly in a bid to tell them to back off. Close Elephant throws branch at jeep passengers UP NEXT VIDEO Elephant throws branch at jeep passengers 
The safari group were in South Africa when they filmed vision of the offending elephant. 
In the vision the large bull elephant can be seen picking up a two large tree branches and seemingly throwing them towards the terrified tourists. Elephant throws branch at jeep passengers. Source: Newsflash 
According to Newsflare the elephant possibly broke off the tree branches and threw them in a bid to intimidate the group. 
The large tree branch narrowly missed the tourists and instead hits the vehicle. 
"The branch almost hit my head, and landed on the passengers seat where luckily no one was sitting," the filmer wrote online according to Newsflare. The moment the male elephant picks up the stick. Source: Newsflash 
The person who captured the vision said the elephant appeared to be in the throes of musth Newflare reports. 
Musth is a period of increased reproductive hormones in male elephants, which can often lead to highly aggressive behavior. 
The video was filmed on February 14 in the Sungulwane region according to reports. 
Newsbreak â€“ February 28
